actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, by extending certain expiration dates, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends for three years the expiration dates of specified provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965. Extends for three years the Emergency Insured Student Loan Act of 1969.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, by extending certain expiration dates, and for other purposes.
